alert.note: Alert for Henry; Oldham; Trimble (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 4:19PM EDT until June 22 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Clark County in south central Indiana... Oldham County in central Kentucky... Trimble County in central Kentucky... Northwestern Henry County in central Kentucky... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 418 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were from near Bedford to 9 miles northwest of La Grange to near Prospect, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... La Grange, Bedford, Pendleton, Crestwood, Orchard Grass Hills, Pewee Valley, Owen, Goshen, Campbellsburg and Bethlehem. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
